title: Michael Connor: in conversation with Conrad Bodman
brief_description: Michael Connor, Consultant Curator of ‘Screen Worlds: The Story of Film, Television and Digital Culture’, is in conversation with Conrad Bodman, ACMI’s Head of Exhibitions. Connor discusses both the overall concept and the separate sections of the exhibition. Connor and Bodman discuss some of the challenges of choosing, sourcing and exhibiting over a hundred years of creative work and technology relating to the moving image.
